entry.title: Oakland’s Fourth of July parade keeps its hometown spirit
entry.summary: OAKLAND — Oakland’s Fourth of July parade has been around since it featured horses and buggies. The hometown charm of the event, however, hasn’t been lost, though the parade has traded in carriages for sports cars.

entry.title: Bringing Hawaii to fine wine: The story of Freed Estate Winery
entry.summary: While Hawaii isn’t known for fine wine, Freed Estate Winery brings the island spirit to Oregon wine country. Located 20 minutes from Roseburg in the Winston area, this riverside vineyard has been producing wine for 25 years.

entry.title: SOU considers partners for older adult housing and education facility

entry.title: Riverbend Live! prepares to kickoff with a performance from Southern Avenue
